name: Woodsman 'I Love You' Paper Doll greeting's Card
description:
Here is an adult version of those paper dolls and constrution kits we had as kids to tell the most wonderful person in the world just how much you love them. 

Cut out the woodsman in his warm thermal underpants and then the tree, bunting, the signpost (to those wonderful places hugs and kisses), the rabbit and finally dress the woodsman with his sign - I love you.

We have designed the card so it can be sent by a woman or a man to their partner.

As it says on the card ......Just to say I love you I sent the woodsman with a message especially for you!

The card is approximately 81/2 inches by 5 3/4 inches (A5) and the woodsman stands around 51/2 inches tall. The card comes with a diamond flap envelope and is professionally full color printed in thick 350gsm card. 

Free postage to the UK and at cost to the US.

The detail is beautiful and its sure to make a wonderful display not just for Valentines but for the months to come.

name: Fun handmade felt animal bag charms or Key ring
description:
Fun handmade felt animal bag charms/Keyrings.

There are Ten designs; 
please choose from beaver, bear, raccoon, frog, fox, lion and ladybird, cat, rabbit, panda 

There is a whole forest of beautiful handmade felt animal bag charms for you to choose from! These felt critters also work well as wedding favours, kids party bag treats, stocking fillers and make the perfect small gift (although folk tell us they often don't part with them once they have them in their paws!).


As every item is handmade colours, the design of an animal and ribbon may vary .

These key rings/bag charms are not suitable for small children.

Made from:
Handmade in high quality 30% wool felt.

Dimensions:
Approx 8cm by 5cm (sizes vary slighty with each design)

name: Personalised Wedding Gift Handmade Art doll Bears
description:
Handmade miniature felt bride and bridegroom bear doll.

Finally, by popular demand, our personalised wedding bears have arrived!
These bride and bridegroom miniature bears are beautifully detailed and unique. Each bear is individually made and hand stitched in TheBigForest.

The bride carries a lovely bouquet of roses tied with red velvet ribbon, the groom is in his natty best bowtie and top hat.

Your personalised wedding bear dolls come tissue wrapped in their own manila gift boxes.

A unique and wonderful gift to remember a special day.

Your wedding bears can be personalised with one or two personalised badges with Good Luck, the name of the happy couple (each name is 9 letters maximum), the date of the wedding or the name of the happy couple and the word wedding (again each name is 9 letters maximum).

Colours and details may vary as every felt doll is handmade.

Made from:
Bear dolls are made in high quality 30% wool felt. The eyes are beautiful small safety eyes in rich colours.

Please note: Animals from TheBigForest are for decorative display. They are not suitable for young children and are not designed to meet current toy safety legislation.

Dimensions:
Each Bear: H13 x W 7.5 cm
